title: [GAMEPLAY] Wont let me see the champion icon of me and my team
body:
When i join a game and we are in blind pick i can't see what champion me and my teammates picked.
This has happened 100% of the times i have joined a game (4/4 games) .
How this bug happened
1. Woke up
2. opend up league 
3. joined a normal summoner's rift game
4. selected a champion (azir)
5. and noticed that i couldn't see his icon or any of my team mate icon

Please help me as this affects what champ i can play and i cant see if anyone instalocks a lane so i can't work around them because i don't know what lane they are going to go.

Barfy66

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) and letting me know if this helps, if not we can explore further potential causes.
